alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 6:21AM CDT until May 07 at 8:23AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected to continue. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Greene and Polk. * WHEN...Until 600 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 618 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - This replaces flash flood warnings that were issued last night. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springfield, Republic, Battlefield, Strafford, Willard, Ash Grove, Fair Grove and Walnut Grove. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
